headline: Weitz Partners III Opportunity Fund Exited Old Dominion Freight Lines (ODFL) in 2024 on Share Price Appreciation
summary: Weitz Investment Management, an investment management firm, released its “Partners III Opportunity Fund” fourth-quarter 2024 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The fund’s Institutional Class returned +1.21% in the fourth quarter bringing the yearly returns to +16.25 compared to +2.63% and +23.8 returns for the Russell 3000 for both the […]

headline: Old Dominion Freight Line: Just Getting Started
summary: Old Dominion Freight Lines' robust network drives profitability and growth. Read why ODFL stock is a buy, with a strong moat and runway for future success.
